name: Dreamron Straight Protective Shampoo
description: An ultra effective formula that protects and nourishes straight hair. The mild SLES free formula cleanses hair while retaining the balance of natural moisture. It overlaps the cuticle scales adding extra shine and preserves its natural elasticity. Rice in Pro-Vitamin B5 & wheatproteins it restores cystine that`s depleted in the straightening process & regular maintenance. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
